name: Galaxy Mirror Glaze Cake - Sweet Desserts Maker
Doors Push or Pull
description: You are trapped in a endless hallway of doors. Push the doors that are marked push and pull the doors marked pull. There is no escape.. eventually you will pull a push door or push a pull door- once you do your game is over.

name: Digit Daze
description: Digit Daze is a fun and challenging mathematical puzzle game. You are given a main number less than 100 and one to four color goals to complete with the 16 provided digits. Each color goal can require 2 to 4 numbers to reach the main number.

name: Indian Mutiny: Little Sepoy
description: Take part in the Sepoy Mutiny – the uprising in India between 1857-58 against the rule of the British East India Company.

name: Digital Dungeon
description: Help a prisoner to escape from the virtual reality jail in our game Digital Dungeon. It is an extremely exciting puzzle shooter, where your main weapon is...physics! Remember electrostatics, when two elements of different electrical charge are drawn to each other. You'll also need a huge explosion. Annihilate your enemies and find your way to freedom!

name: Chaos of East
description: Chaos of East is a roguelike side scrolling action game. Abandoning the traditional dungeon level form in favor of combining a large number of Chinese elements, this is a simple game experience with a large amount of game content, bringing players an easy-to-use and interesting intuitive experience.

name: In My Mind.
description: In My Mind. is a shooting game with metaphors about mind and feelings. Face 18 different negative emotions. Your goal is to overcome them without being defeated.

name: Vive le Roi 2
description: « Vive le Roi 2 » is a puzzle platform game with 36 levels taking place during the French Revolution. Can you save him and change history?

name: Cubelz
description: Cubelz is or will be a game of achieving a specific goal in a certain amount of time without being hindered by opponents

name: Boy's Love
description: Luka, studying in a high school, lives in a flat with his dearest friend Miharu; and they both secretly were developing feelings for each other for quite some time now... Is it finally a time to confess? And... is there any happily-ever-after for them?

name: USA 2020
description:
The year 2020 has arrived. A herd of fuckin' ugly reptilians are rushing from the outer space.
Crime rate skyrocketed! United States of America is ruined! Wipe out all 12 billion of the green scum!

name: Common Hanzi Quiz: Simplified Chinese
description: A quiz that helps you review common Chinese characters you will come across in everyday text. By practicing and reviewing, you can learn 2,538 Hanzi, their meanings and pronunciations.

name: Oiled
description: Hack and Slash zombie tower defense rhytm game with wide arsenal of melee weapons and stationar towers. Your heart beats only when music is playing. Party zombies like your music too and will try to dance near DJ Trump. Zombies are so inaccurate and certainly will break audio system!

name: Eggs 1942
description: The Bad Eggs are mobilising their forces across the world. Join the Royal Egg Force and save the world with large scale eggy warfare.

name: Owen to have fun!
description: Owen to have fun! this is a challenging but fun game with lots of traps and puzzles. You will have to spend your time to go through this game. Owen loves challenges, help him accomplish all the achievements!

name: lilGunBois
description: Just a lil game about some lil pixely gun bois doing lil gun boi things. Pew pew!

name: Bulletline
description: Welcome to a world where ninjas, spec-ops agents, chefs, cowboys, princesses, and the wretched hag do battle with automatic assault weapons and high-powered rifles - Bulletline is the ultimate combat-focused, team-based, local-multiplayer game-mode-royale.

name: Erotic Jigsaw Challenge Vol 1
description: 20 puzzles await you in Erotic Jigsaw Challenge Vol. 1! Fun puzzle solving action with beautiful artwork. Rise to the challenge!

name: Black Bart
description: Play for the most successful burglar of stagecoaster in the history of the Wild West. The hero of the quest, who above all appreciates human life, makes afraid without a single shot.

name: Idle Heist
description: Idle Heist is an Idle/Clicker game where the objective is to get as much money from the bank vault before you get caught! Through the use of upgrades and skills, earn MILLIONS or even TRILLIONS of dollars. This is the perfect game to play whilst you work or do other tasks!

name: Smartphone Tycoon
description: «Smartphone Tycoon» — unique business simulator. Create your own company for the production of smartphones! Your main goal will be to achieve worldwide recognition and take the company to the temple of fame of the global market.

name: Narrows
description:
Climb aboard, captain! Become master and commander in the golden age of piracy.

Narrows transports players to the golden age of piracy, making you master and commander of your very own pirate ship in VR. Through the magic of your VR headset and controller, you can choose your own path on the high seas, customize your cannons and crew, and do battle with the royal navy, rival pirates and more.

name: Slither Snake IO 2018
description: Slither.io is a massively multiplayer online video game available for iOS, Android, and web browsers, developed by Steve Howse. Players control an avatar resembling a worm, which consumes multicolored pellets, both from other players and ones that naturally spawn on the map in the game, to grow in size. The objective of the game is to grow the longest worm in the server. Slither.io is similar in concept to the popular 2015 web game Agar.io and is reminiscent of the classic arcade game Snake.

name: Drake - Gods Plan Piano Tiles 2
description: Drake - Gods Plan songs now is avaialbe in Piano games with cool magic tiles.

name: Zippr Fleet
description: Join ZiPPR Fleet and grow in its ranks! Relax, have fun, and develop dexterity!

name: Minako
description: Minako is a retro indie game. The goal is to defend your castle for 30 nights.

name: Real Craft: City Builder
description: <<< - Install and get one of the best games in your segment! - >>>

name: Google Spotlight Stories: Back to the Moon
description: A charming illusionist, an adventurous queen of hearts and an evil green man journey through early cinema, film magic and love. Back to the Moon VR is an animated, interactive short celebrating the artistry of French film director and magician Georges Méliès.

name: Awakening of Celestial
description: Awakening of Celestial is a magical fantasy Visual Novel filled with exciting adventures, epic moments, complex characters, and many more! Developed by Celestial Project and the platform will be PC.

name: Super B-Dino's adventures
description: Super B-Dino's adventures - A game about the dinosaur Dino - a small dragon. Help Dino overcome all the challenges and climb as high as possible.

name: Aerospace Forces
description: On the planet earth, attacked by aliens. Only you - the captain of aerospace forces can save the planet from enemies. You have to protect the orbital station, and also penetrate into the rear of the enemy and destroy all aliens.

name: Forgotten Adventure
description: A forgotten adventure is a game about a nice little man. Somehow our hero forgot the road, he was lost and got into an enchanted place. And now, he is looking for his way, overcoming traps, dangers and various obstacles. Every time he falls into a trap, everything starts with a new one. Take on the role of this unfortunate little man and try to take the biggest record for passing!

name: Save the Villy
description: Save The Villy - A game about a simple forester who devoted his entire life to his work. Years passed, but he was still faithful to his work, but at one point the life of the forest was in danger..

name: Skelli Tower Defense
description: Build towers and defend your lands from a horde of undead miscreants! Three modes of difficulty, including one made with kids in mind (age 5+), and a challenge mode where you must defend your castle while strategically placing your defenses. Do you have what it takes to defeat Red Skelli and his army?

name: Mystery USA! - Fun Seek and Find Hidden Object Puzzles
Smile'N'Slide
description: A fun and colorful game about a little dude who loves to play the ape in his day-to-day life by sliding on inclined surfaces.

name: Bully Store
description:
Turn bully students into model students as much as possible and get the most points!
And special character teacher and puppy appear to help you.
If you throw your coffee to the teacher, they turn the bad students in the cafeteria into good students and force them back !!
If you throw hotdog to dog, bully students time counts increase +30
you can competition with friend by the score.

name: Castle: Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Colorful and bright Castle jigsaw puzzles will strike your imagination. Do puzzle in a new way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving game play will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Castle: Jigsaw Puzzles is designed for adults and for kids.

name: Chimera of Tactics 2
description: This is an innovative fast-paced third-person shooter game.

name: Gym Simulator
description: Extremely realistic first person Gym RPG

name: Ghost Killer
description: Earlier, there were flowering meadows, but the fire turned the land into a barren waste ground. Now here live only ghosts and a wandering light that collects the souls of the dead.

name: Drizzlepath: Deja Vu
description: A man embarks on a journey toward the top of a mountain, to discover the truth of his existence. Along the way, he ponders the nature of life itself. Drizzlepath: Deja Vu is a spiritual revisitation of Tonguç Bodur's very first game, Drizzlepath.

name: Hexaluga: Dungeons and Hunting
description: Gather a party of heroic fighters and lead them through various dungeons to hunt dangerous monsters in this atmospheric RPG-clicker game.

name: Abstract Golfing
description: Abstract Golfing - this is a simple game where you need to throw the ball higher and higher on the mountain, you can not die, there is no reset button, so from this game you get only peace and pleasure.

name: Music Producer
description: Always dreamed of being a producer of a music band and make its way to the top. In this card game you are going to take on a role of a music band manager, starting from the scratch and grow your musicians from underground performers to world-known superstars.

name: Disaster Will Strike
description:
Wouldn't it be cool to have superpowers?!
Create natural disasters to smash angry little eggs!
Disaster Will Strike gives you the power to control natural disasters. Use hurricanes, earthquakes and more to smash hundreds of angry little eggs that you don't want to hatch!

name: Aria's Story
description: Aria’s Story is a horror RPG game made using RPG Maker VX Ace. The game is focused on exploration, story and puzzles. One of the main characteristics of the game is the contrast between cute and creepy. It is inspired by the Japanese horror game Ib.

name: World Chef
description: A game to create your restaurant and cook the finest recipes to attract VIP customers.

name: Battle Slimes
description: Battle Slimes is a simple one button local-multiplayer arena shooter.

name: The Ensign
description: death awaits. their humanity. this world. makes them strong.

name: Rooftop Freerunning: Leap! Leap!! Leap!!!
description:
Leap Leap Leap! is a fast-paced, endless running game where you leap from rooftop to rooftop in a computer simulated world. Download the free stack jumping game and get excited by this fabulous computer simulated world of skyscrapers and surreal colors in parallax effect. On your way, collect cubes and revival points as many as you can to make a long run on top of the buildings.
Top the with a high score.

name: SpacewAR Uprising
description:
SPACEWAR UPRISING is the ultimate augmented reality galactic war game – in which you take control of a heavily-equipped spaceship and destroy alien battleships.
Play the exciting extra-terrestrial infinite war game SPACE UPRISING.
THE GAMER
You are one of the most intrepid military pilots on the Earth.
You are given warships stacked with a wide range of weapons.
You need to destroy all alien spaceships
You need to protect X-Castera and be one of the Guardians of Earth
Get into the cockpit and fight bravely
THE GAME PLAY
The player has to move around to play this super exciting Augmented Reality game
Spaceships will come close to the player through space entrances
Locate your enemies on the RADAR screen
Choose your weapon wisely to attack the powerful battleships
Destroy the enemy spaceship and become a hero in the Universe
Collect Space Chips from the destroyed spaceships
Utilise the Space Chips to buy advanced battleships and fight better
Acquire the Protecting Shields to escape from enemy attack

THE STORY
Clomatandria, is a miscreation, merciless and dominant alien and commander of Clomazavendra galaxy. She wanted to be God, and make her galaxy the centre of the Universe; hence is destroying other galaxies with her evil powers. When she planned to destroy Earth, the best brains of our planet developed the energy core X-Castera as a protecting shield. X-Castera needs to be placed and activated in different parts of our planet, and it needs to be protected.
She wants to destroy X-Castera, and will send a fleet of her ferocious battle ships for this mission.
The bravest fighter pilots in our planet are assigned with the ultimate mission- to activate X-Castera and protect it from the savagery alien ships
THE MISSION
Find a suitable location to place and activate X-Castera
Protect X-Castera from the savagery alien spaceships.
Destroy all alien spaceships and collect space chips from them
THE ENEMY SPACESHIPS
*DUVINUS **OCTACLODRIAN **XAMANDRIAN **PROGECTRANIO** **COSPOMALEANTRA ***EMPTADRIA *** DUMOPUGUSTRA ***
***TRACHOLOMBUDUS **** CRYNOBETTENAIHCRA ****

The enemy battleships are endless. Get ready to fight
PURSUIT AND BATTLE
Fight it out with a huge array of villainous spaceships in iconic locations
Adventure through an exciting Sci-Fi story line in view of a fictional Galaxy
Play it anywhere the action-packed fighting utilizing your surroundings
Developed specifically for the iOS devices with ARKit

name: Total Battleground
description:
Total Battleground is action platformer game up to 4 players, where players are spawned in a battlefield map to kill each other. Choose between 5 factions and win against each other. Enjoy intense versus battles between factions or coop with each other to kill the darkness lurking within the battlefield. 
 
Key features: 
2-4 player versus battle with 2 games modes (last man standing and timed deathmatch) 
10 Versus maps 
AI can be added in versus battles 
2 coop levels with dark enemies 
1 coop level with zombie mode

name: Papa's Hot Doggeria to Go!
description: Serve seasonal stadium favorites on the go in this new version of Papa's Hot Doggeria, with gameplay and controls reimagined for iPhone and iPod Touch!

name: Flame Hero
description: Fire up and drop off, burner!

name: Car Simulator Veneno
description: Become the coolest driver of Veneno.

name: Bingo Tropical Haven: Island Beach Fever
Up Up Bot
description: In UP UP BOT help your robot friend climb the platforms by tapping the screen. Be careful and watch out for bad robots trying to stop you from progressing even higher. Endless fun for everyone!

name: Clash Warlords
description: Join the Epic Battles in this most addicting turn-based strategy war-chess game with game play similar to classic Heroes of Might and Magic series.

name: Slender Man Origins 3: Abandoned School
description:
The long-awaited sequel to the major hit games Slender Man Origins 1 & 2.
Introducing Slender Man Origins 3: Abandoned School.

name: Dirty Birdy: An Evil Minded Rhyme Game
Just Skate
description: Choose your favorite Justin Bieber and just skate! Olly through various themed levels, earn coins, WIN WEEKLY PRIZES and gain momentum while your favorite JB songs play.

name: Captain Sabertooth and the Treasure of Lama Rama
Meet the Letters Flashcards: Uppercase
description: Guess the letter and flip the card to see it come to life!

name: Revenge of Anubis: Pyramid Adventure
description: A key and item finding, platforming, destroy enemies side scrolling adventure!

name: Sprint Dodge
description: A game made by a 16 year old! Enjoy :)

name: Summer Vacation
description:
Summer!, Beach! and VR!
Hot summer has come! How about vacations at VR Beach?
Let's experience a fun time a tropical beach.
You can enjoy VR tropical country with plenty of attractions!
It is also important to heal the tired body after plenty playing? !
It also implements functions that can be nulled using oil.
Here we go! Let's experience hot summer "SUMMER VACATION" this summer!
Here's your expectation!

name: F1 2018
description: MAKE HEADLINES in F1 2018. F1 2018 is the official videogame of the 2018 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP. The new game immerses players into the world of Formula 1 more than ever before.

name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl
description: S.T.A.L.K.E.R 2 is a unique blend of FPS, immersive sim and horror with a really thick atmosphere. One of the biggest open-worlds to date is yours to explore — along with an epic branching story with multiple endings. S.T.A.L.K.E.R. stands for (Scavengers, Trespassers, Adventurers, Loners, Killers, Explorers and Robbers).

name: Dark Soil
description:
"Darks Souls meets a Garden Game.

Made in 3 days for the Ludum Dare 41, Theme was "combine 2 incompatibles game genres"

"Cultivate your garden and earn souls from dangerous plant species"

Get seeds and plant them on Soil tiles, then use your watering can to grow them and earn souls. Every 5 levels, you unlock a chest in the sanctuary that gives you a more powerful weapon and heal you."

name: Ramen Bowl Chicken Roll
description: "Be the last down the hill to not end up in a Ramen Bowl!"

name: Gematombe
description: Gematombe is an action-puzzle-vs-game where you can play one-on-one matches against your friends or the computer.

name: Pan Galactic Railway
description: Explore galaxies! Haul cargo! Fight pirates! Pilot a space train!

name: Carto
description: Carto is a tile placement adventure game where you explore the lands you placed and discover the secrets while exploring. What will happen to the world and the characters when you rearrange the tiles of the map?

name: The Cinema Rosa
description:
The Cinema Rosa is an immersive PC and Mac exploration game and puzzle game set in an abandoned cinema.

The game explores themes of: loss, romance, nostalgia and regret, aiming to take the player on an emotional journey through the psychological effects of a relationship. You take on the role of a protagonist exploring his past through various personal demons.

As you explore, you encounter various notes, objects and puzzles that you can interact with, reconstructing the cinema to its former glory days.

The game is set for release in early 2019 on PC, Mac and Occulus.

name: 1943 Deadly Desert
description: North Africa 1943. Lead your forces to victory in the most intense WW2 battle!

name: Elixir of Immortality II: The League of Immortality
description: How many deaths costs immortality? What demons are ready to let decided to live forever? Try to answer these questions acting on behalf of the detective. Mortal detective...

name: EggTime 2
description: Catch eggs, defuse bombs, and other crazy stuff using special powerups like variation of bullet time to catch even the most hard to catch eggs.

name: Lethal Running
description:
Action RPG about a deadly game show in a futuristic dystopian society. 
Fight neverending attacks from merciless bounty hunters in the ruins of the city and survive the rough conditions of the devastated wasteland.

name: Almost a Hero
description: Almost a Hero is a free-to-play idle/clicker game available on iOS and Android devices. Your objective is to recruit and train heroes to take on endless waves of enemies. Along the way, unlock more hero characters, tap away with new powerful rings, pets with fantastical abilities, and finally permanent artifact upgrades to make your next run just that little bit less deadly.

name: Orbu
description:
Help a host of cute and cuddly animal spirits journey home in this tranquil Augmented Reality (AR) game. Tap, drag and release to guide your spirit animal through a variety of zen gardens, each with their own hidden secrets to find. Watch the seasons change as you master each level by earning three stars and unlocking new chapters in the story.
AR allows you to choose your play space whether indoors or out and enables you to physically walk around the in-game environments. This will help you find all the secrets and the perfect angles to complete each level.

name: The Forgotten Void
description: A journey of the mind with puzzles and turn based combat.

name: Bastard
description:
Have you ever thought about the price of being good, even in bad times? Bastard is an adventure that puts an emphasis on decision-making. A realistic medieval world is waiting for you - tactical combat and a detective story included. And most importantly: people whose problems and questions have been the same for centuries. 
 
Game features 
- Experience a deep story that reflects on the cost of being a good person in a bad world. 
- Enjoy a fresh take on the classic medieval setting. 
- Take a stand on social issues that are challenging yet essential up to this very day. 
- Your choices determine how the plot unfolds - and into which of its many possible endings. 
- Immerse yourself in a unique narrative system. 
- Master tactical battles combined with RPG elements known from Legends of Eisenwald.

name: Titanic Panic
description:
Titanic Panic is an endless runner that challenges players to save as many drowning swimmers as possible while dodging icebergs aiming to sink your boat! 
 
The game is also equipped with an Online Leaderboard to compete against other players for the best score! Your score is tallied by your distance multiplied by the number of swimmers you save so let's see how far you get! 
 
 
 
If you like the game well enough consider donating $1, this will ensure that more content gets added to Titanic Panic such as power-ups and additional maps! This will also help further development of our next upcoming game Evil Never Dies as well! 
 
 
 
FEATURES: 
 
3 DIFFICULTY LEVELS - You can choose from Easy, Medium, Hard to change how fast your boat flies across the water. 
 
RANDOM LEVEL GENERATOR - No level is ever the same! Every time you click that play button and start it the level creates itself and keeps on going! It never ends until you lose and sink your Boat! 
 
ONLINE LEADERBOARD - At the start of the game it'll ask you to allow the game through your firewall to connect to the internet so that you can submit your score to compete against other players across the globe! Who will have the top score?! 
 
MENU OPTIONS - The game is equipped with multiple options to allow you to control the overall quality of the game. You can even lower the audio and sfx. 
 
CONTROL MAPPING - Don't want to use the A & D Keys to turn left and right? Go into the Options Menu and remap it to whatever suits your fancy! 
 
 
 
HOW TO PLAY: 
 
Load up the game, name your boat via the Profile option, click New Game, choose your difficulty level, click start, then start the level when you're ready and away you and your boat will go! 
 
 
 
CONTROLS: 
 
A = Turn Left (remappable in options menu) 
 
D = Turn Right (remappable in options menu) 
 
* A & D Turn Left and Right while going straight but once you hit a corner simply hit these again to enable a 90% turn otherwise you'll crash into an Iceberg if not you don't turn quick enough on time!

name: Speed Brawl
description: Speed Brawl is a 2D combat-racer about moving fast and hitting hard! Maintain your momentum, build your combos, and unleash powerful special moves. Find your own fighting style, and assemble the finest team of brawlers ever seen. Then do it all again faster... faster... FASTER!!!

name: Green Hell
description: Green Hell is a sweltering struggle for survival in the Amazonian rainforest. Clinging to life, the player is set on a journey of durability as the effects of solitude wear heavy not only on the body but also the mind. How long can you survive against the dangers of the unknown?

name: The Last of Us: Ellie Edition
description: Twenty years after a mutated fungus started turning people all over the world into deadly zombies, humans become an endangered species. Joel, a Texan in his forties with the "emotional range of a teaspoon" (to quote Hermione from Harry Potter), finds himself responsible with the safety of a fourteen year old girl named Ellie whom he must smuggle to a militia group called the Fireflies. And as if the infected aren't enough of a hassle, they also have to deal with the authorities who wouldn't let them leave the quarantine zone, as well as other survivors capable of killing anyone who might have something useful in their backpacks.

name: Military:Run
description: Military like game made to kill time.Its fun and easy to play.You can chose multiple skins and 4 game modes where you fight bad soldiers.First avaliable mode is infinite runner.

name: Homo Machina
description: Homo Machina is a 2D exploration mobile game, inspired by Dr. Fritz Kahn’s medical illustrations. Journey through the human body which becomes a gigantic mechanized factory, filled with tiny workers that are controlling every function of the human anatomy. By adapting his work into a video game, we want to share his vision that science can be fun and raise awareness about his iconic work. Young players will find a fun entry point into exploring the human body with the artistic expression in Homo Machina, with each level exuding charismatic animation and sound effects. The game makes it possible to operate the main functions of the human body with straightforward gameplay appealing everyone with its charm.

name: Zoo-phonics 14: The Penguin Pond Word Order Game
Zoo-phonics 8. Make It Say with Inny Inchworm
Chris Brackett's Kamikaze Karp
description: Watch out for the krazy karp infesting the waters! Use your bowhunting skills to kill the slimy fish and turn them into coins. Asian carp are destructive, but your bow is more powerful than any fish frenzy!

name: Tank Hero: Laser Wars
description: Equip your tank with ray guns, plasma howitzers, sonic cannons, and more. Use the all new interactive environments to strategically take our your enemies.

name: Little Airplane 3D for kids: learn colors, numbers
Minesweeper Genius
description: Modern take on the classic minefield game!Tons of randomly generated levels!

name: Live Portrait Maker
description: Create your own fashionable, animated 2.5 girl 😊

name: G30
description: Unique puzzles that are deeply connected to the story — wrapped in stylish flat design. The game shows how a person with a mental disease conceives reality. We see the world that slips away from the main character whose personality and memory will soon fade away together with the reason of his existence.

name: Queen's Garden 2
description: In Queen's Garden 2, the Princess became a queen! Help her loyal assistant Jack rebuild the royal garden from scratch in this unique match 3 game.

name: Maze Race Challenge
description: Enjoy racing other players through a 3d maze on your Android device.

name: Gem Blast: Magic Match Puzzle
description: Join the thrilling & magical gem blast puzzle adventure with Lily and Mojo!

name: Iron Throne
description: The most immersive, full 3D graphics real-time MMO strategy game!

name: Pool Slide Story
description:
Splish, splash, splosh! The time has come to create some waves and open your very own wet, wonderful (sometimes whacky) water park! Hear that? That’s the sound of super-slippy pool-slide shenanigans. You want in? Of course you do.

Expand your water park, adding exciting facilities, and become the talk of the town. Your visitors will take selfies at your park, generating free publicity for you! Befriend them and they'll send you comments and suggestions.

Make your visitors happy by offering a range of foods and beverages for purchase at food stalls, creating colored or scented pools, and giving away free floats and swimwear.

Collect ingredients and cook foods, then create menus for your food stalls.

You'll be spoiled for choice when customizing your water park, with a wide choice of attractions to build. You can also have both indoor and outdoor pools, so that no matter the weather, your visitors will always have somewhere to splash about in comfort.

Can you create a wonderful water park that everyone will love?

name: Cooking Madness - A Chef's Restaurant Games
description: Cooking Madness brings out your inner crazy chef in this NEW restaurant game!

name: Ctrl CV
description: Welcome to the world of Ctrl CV, a find-the-image platformer puzzle game. You are surrounded by countless clones of yourself, and your goal is to find the source of these doppelgangers. Try not to lose yourself in the midst of "yourselves".

name: Moon Surfing
description: Grab a solar board and surf the moon’s dusty hills and steep craters. It is up to you – if you roam freely, perhaps practicing some kickflips, or if you head directly to the marked waypoints.

name: Piano Game X
description:
Piano Game X is a musical and memory game! The game plays a note and you have to guess and play it on the piano. If you guess right other notes will be added creating long melodies. Will you remember the whole sequence? 
Challenge your friends, train your hear and discover always new tunes!

name: Modsork
description: Modsork is all about its mind-splitting controls: the challenge they present, but also the intense satisfaction of mastering them and pulling off cool special abilities, a bit like in a fighting game.

name: Word Swipe
description: If you like solving various puzzles and are looking for a new and exciting online game, welcome to Word Swipe. On the screen in front of you will be a playing field divided into equal number of cells and filled with letters of English alphabet. Your task is to clear the field of letters. To do this you need to look carefully through the field and find the letters next to each other, which can form a word. Then simply connect these letters with a line using your mouse. As soon as you do this, these letters will disappear from the playing field and you will get points. Thus, solving puzzles and guessing words, you will gradually clear the field of letters.

name: Sky Baron: War of Planes
description:
Epic plane battles during WORLD WAR I.
Experience STUNNING GRAPHICS and AMAZING GAMEPLAY of the most beautiful warplane related game you’ve ever played on your mobile device!
Discover the aviation of Great War! Take down enemy air crafts!

name: Bun Wars: Best of fun for Boys Girls and Kids
description: It's a time to defend your castle by playing unique strategy Tower Defense game - Bun Wars! Bun Wars is a new world with immersive atmosphere and great battles, excellent graphics! Defence your castle from the crowds of enemy units, which sets new large-scale standards in tower defence genre. In this world players have the opportunity to feel great strategists. Great not without purpose. There are very many enemies - up to 5000 units per battle, and 1000 units per attack, and they all rush to the gate of the castle. The only result is to win or be defeated.

name: Faily Rider
description: In this physics-based motorbike game you must maneuver an endless mountainside dodging hazardous terrains such as cacti, rocks, traffic and trains resulting in some fun and hilarious near misses and crashes.

name: Moto Highway Rider
description: Moto Highway Rider is #1 fast paced 3D motorbike driving and racing game.

name: AirTycoon 3
description:
Welcome to Air Tycoon 3! - Authentic turn based airline management simulation single player game based on 'Air Tycoon Online' which is being loved by world wide players.

Basically this version is a demo version. If you want to enjoy the full version, you should purchase an in-app in the game.

Build and manage worldwide airline with detailed statistic management support!
Now, passengers in the world are ready to on board to your airline!

name: Silversword
description: Forget Smaug, Voldemort or the White Walkers! The real bad guys are waiting for you in Silversword. Ready your sword and spells and prepare to face the evil.

name: Word Town: New Crossword Games
description: In Word Town, there are 5000+ mind challenging puzzles to test your spelling, imaginative puzzle themes to boost your brainpower, fun cross words to enhance your vocabulary, and attractive city landscapes to fresh your eyes.

name: Ball Collector
description: Collect balls and money, and have fun.

name: GoBotix
description: Solve platform puzzles with tiny robots!

name: DragonCrash
description: DragonCrash is a 3D Battle Arena Treasure game. Select between 5 different dragons and gather gems to power up while taking down your foes! After getting the required amount, defend and capture the zone!

name: Magic Griddlers 2
description: Solve the warlock’s puzzles and save the good magicians of a magical world! 120 new griddlers in Magic Griddlers 2!

name: Fill & Cross: Pirate Riddles 2
description: Gone are the days when Misty Albion sought after courageous gentlemen of fortune. Now that Great Britain has called on the help of pirates, your aim is to help the country take control of the vast expanses of the ocean. It takes a brave sea dog to accept this challenge. But first, you’ll need to decipher some old maps.

name: Operation Z - For Zombies
description: First and Third person Realistic shooting game. Protect the town from zombies!

name: Virtual Mother New Baby Twins Family Simulator
description: Be a virtual mother & take care of new baby twins in family simulator Game

name: Tower Jump
description: Enjoy the adventure of bouncing ball through the spiral helix tower labyrinth.

name: Survival.io - Battle Royale
description: Surviv.io - Battle Royale - indie survival battle royale game

name: Final Hunter: Wild Animal Hunting
description: Final Hunter: Wild Animal Hunting brings a new 3D shooting experience!

name: Wedding Fiasco - The Race for the Perfect Dress
description: Your big sis's wedding day is ruined! Earn money so you can save the day!

name: Love two balls
description: Love two balls is the best brain & dots puzzle game! 300 free levels to play!

name: Chinese Chess, Xiangqi (Professional Edition)
description: A very powerful Chinese chess game.

name: PlanetExplorerVR
description: Explore Mars, Mercury and Pluto like never seen before in virtual reality

name: Kart Racing 3D - Top Car Racer Chaser Action Rally
Meet the Letters Flashcards: Lowercase
description: Guess the letter and flip the card to see it come to life!

name: Pop Star Dress Up - Music Idol Girl
Monster Arena
description: Train and befriend your own monster and teach him valuable power, defense, agility and intelligence skills. Praise, train, and battle with nearby monsters who wandered into your neighborhood. make your way up into the monster tournament and become the ultimate monster trainer. Welcome into the world of monsters! Choose your type of monster, whether it tough, agile, or other! Choose your monster class, from mage, assassin, or other! Battle over dozens of trainers! Develop your monster status and their abilities! Join various events! Explore the Monster Arena world!

name: Simstory: Live As You Wish
description: An interactive story game in which your choices can change everything.

name: Stickman Archers: Archery Rampage
description: Destroy the enemyes archers by dint of your own bow in this great archery game!

name: Diggerman
description: Diggerman is an ultimate digging experience introducing brand new arcade mechanics.

name: Soccer Physics
description: Push the button to somehow control your team.

name: Witches' Legacy: Hunter and the Hunted HD
Real Miami Street Gangsters Crime Mafia Glory Lord
Virtual Mother Family Game: Working Mom Simulator
description: Play virtual mother family game, perform working mom tasks in fun simulator game

name: Black Powder
description: Black Powder is a team-based, realistic, competitive multiplayer first-person shooter for PC set in the Wild West. Featuring an unique game mode, prepare to a new way of fighting. Change the battlefield with a detailed level interaction, master a wide variety of deadly weapons and go smash some skulls!

name: Battle of Kings
description: The time of war has come! Take the command of your kingdom and use your strategic skills to defend the siege against your fortifications. You can’t win only by defending your Kingdom. Develop your economics, assemble and upgrade your army to defeat the enemy forces in a real Battle of Kings.

name: Extreme Formula Championship
description: Extreme Formula Championship is amazing 3D formula racing game for everyone. Do you Want to become a Championship, then show your desire to be a Formula Racing Champion.

developers.name: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

name: Doors Quest Demo
description: Wow, it's Doors Quest Demo! You gotta go through the door if you wanna win the game!

name: Untouchable
description: Untouchable is a fantasy-themed adventure game, where players wander into a world of fantasy and begin an adventurous journey.

name: City Builder
description: You're a government worker who is building a city one building at a time. Place parts of your building to build the tallest building ever created in this fun filled endless stacker!

name: Rush
description:
Are you ready for the ultimate thrill ride?

Take a dive into the adrenaline-pumping world of wingsuit flying with RUSH! Soar down mountainsides at breakneck speeds. Weave through canyons, dodge outcrops, and plummet down sheer drops as you race towards the finish line.

Do you have what it takes to walk a tightrope at near terminal velocity?

Strap on your Rift and hold on tight; you're in for a Rush!

name: Fortissimo FA//Akkord:Nachsten Phase
description:
Reiji is a typical student on the remote southwest island of Tsukuyomi-jima. However, due to an unexpected event where his life was in danger, he awakened as the 13th magical summoner. After summoning the spirit and magical superweapon Sakura, she gifts him with the special ability ‘Da Capo,’ which allows him to summon anyone who he met in the past 24 hours or reverts items back to its previous state (up to 24 hours ago). Now they must participate in a battle they cannot avoid.

New phase of La'cryma's fortissimo//Akkord:Bsusvier. Contains three new routes for fortissimo's heroines: Sakura, Kurobane Sayuki, and Satomura Momiji with H-scenes.

Moreover, there are three new characters: Loki, Schwarzritter, and Himeshiro Kuri.

Fortissimo FA is the all-ages version of Fortissimo EXS.

name: Maze Madness
description:
First Person Shooter Through a variety of Mazes and challenges. Each level has different weapons and AI to make each entertaining and increasingly more difficult.
Try your luck and Beat your Time to get past each challenge all the levels have in store for you.

name: Corruption
description:
Jason Fury and his gang have corrupted the city.
Help two brothers who want to stop him.

name: Dungeon Quest
description: Fight through enemies in search of an ancient artifact. Three playable classes. Six dungeon levels.

name: Solar Warden
description: A Space Shooter / Real-Time Strategy hybrid. Command the Solar Warden space fleet from the real-time strategy overlay or choose to assume immediate control of any of your fleet directly and combat the Silicoid menace up close!

name: Hakoniwa Explorer Plus
description:
Get ready for a voxel art action game featuring an unprecedented level of freedom!
A whole range of cute girl monsters are waiting to punch, kick, wrap you up, suck your blood, and eat you right up.

name: Zombie Town Online
description:
developer who work company player-unknown battleground make indie game!! 
FPS of Zombie, by Zombie, for Zombie. 
Play with your friends! Install now!!

name: Anima: Gate of Memories - The Nameless Chronicles
description: Anima The Nameless Chronicles is a third person action RPG that tells the story of a man without name, an immortal being cursed to walk the world until the end of time. When a shadow of his past rises again in his path, he will be forced to take part in a conflict in which the very existence is in question. But... Will he be our last hope, or our doom? Accompany him on a travel through his past lives and discover the secret story behind the Gate of Memories. The Nameless Chronicles is the second videogame set in the world of Gaia, from the Anima: Beyond Fantasy RPG table-top books. You will enjoy a deep and multifaceted story where your choices and actions directly impact the journey and decide the fate of the protagonist.

name: WorldQuest
description: Terraria + MOBA + RTS. Buy weapons and armours, use potions, and construct buildings to push your opponents back and plunder their base. Manage your team's economy while also fighting on the frontlines.

name: Squares
description:
Simple game in wich you can entertain and relax yourself. 
Squares flying in many directions from you moves in new game mechanic. 
You should slide the squares by the path and dont touch others squares. 
Different levels and challenges is waiting for you in the game.

name: The Rose of Segunda
description: Decisions made in the outset of the game will determine your personality - with possibilities ranging from a diplomatic scholar to a bawdy hellion - and these, in turn, will open additional conversation options and scenarios that can help or hinder your relationships with those around you.

name: Vietcong
description: Vietcong-survival-shooter in the first person with elements of survival, which is set in Vietnam, in the vicinity of My tho.

name: Trivia Vault: Toy Trivia
description: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Toy Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer toy trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value.

name: Trivia Vault: Fashion Trivia
description: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Fashion Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer fashion trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value

name: Math Problem Challenge
description: Challenge your problem solving skills in this fast paced math game. Each round consists of three math problems: addition, subtraction, multiplication. You must select the correct answer in the limited amount of time that would correctly complete the equation.

name: Math Speed Challenge
description: Challenge your equation solving speed in this fast paced math game. Each round consists of three math problems: addition, subtraction, multiplication. You must select the correct answer in the limited amount of time that would correctly answer the equation.

name: Burgerwise the Clown
description: When Burgerwise finds his home broken into, his friends murdered, weird monsters roaming the halls, and his BURGERS taken, he does what any sensible puppy-smashing clown would; he takes advantage of the situation to kill the rest of his roommates. And take their stuff!

name: Goat Life
description: Goat Life is an unusual 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you have to go through a variety of levels for a goat.

name: Gaze At Maze
description: Gaze At Maze is a 2D top-down Maze game based on the story of a weird maze world which is full of weird looking creatures, powerful bots guarding the human embryos against intruders.

name: LittleBigSoko
description: Little Big Soko - This is a puzzle game on the tank. Your task is that you must move the boxes to certain points on the tank to move to a new level. At higher levels, you will face really complex puzzles, which will take really time to complete.

name: Fading Visage
description: Fading Visage is a mystical horror game where you are to explore gloomy locations and reveal a terrible secret. The abandoned house will be your shelter, however you'll have to go outside from time to time and search for clues that can shed light on a long forgotten incident. The incident that you are somehow involved in - that's for sure, otherwise the mysterious spirit wouldn't call you so persistently and show you the way to the evidences hidden somewhere in these woods and marshes!

name: Ranger vs. Space Mutants
description:
Ranger vs. Space Mutants - It's a dynamic shooter arena. 
In game you need to fend off the wave of mutants.

name: Street Level: Windows Edition
description: A fast paced cyberpunk card game!

name: Trivia Vault: Food Trivia
description: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Food Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer Food trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value.

name: Trivia Vault: Literature Trivia
description: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Literature Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer Literature trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value

name: Bathroom Chef
description: Take a break and cook up some delicious food for your friends! Create full-sized meals right in the bathroom chef's kitchen. Cooking with this revolutionary method involves a graceful balancing of stress and gas.

name: Bomb-Bomb
description:
Quick, Short, Easy to learn game that can be played over and over again.

Features Split-screen Multiplayer and a zombie Singleplayer game

name: G-Dino's Jungle Adventure
description: The green dinosaur Dino once again landed in an adventure. This time, he had to find himself in the wild jungle..

name: Ros
description: Ros - is a logical game game. You must hold the ball before moving to the next level.

name: Epic Drag Puzools
description: In the game Epic Drag Puzools you can go through many levels of puzzles, from easy to difficult..

name: Ding Dong XL
description: Ding Dong XL is a neon-infused one button arcade game. It is an addictive 'just-one-more-round' score chaser, perfect for playing while waiting in queue for another game.

name: Ok/Normal
description: Ok/Normal is a short, experimental third-person horror experience, inspired by early 3D console games of the 90's. Journey through a dark, disjointed, dreamlike dimension with your cloud companion! Remember a good diet, take your medicine, and you should be fine!

name: Astraeus
description: Astraeus is a VR asteroid mining RTS game that's quick to play, easy to learn, and enormous in scope. Build a mining network from dozens of bases, and watch as hundreds of ships swarm around you.

name: Intelligence: Anime girls
description: Puzzle game in which you want to build an image (with beautiful anime girls) so that the picture was like the original image. Move the puzzle tiles wisely to collect the correct order of the pieces of images. The essence of the game as in the old game "Tag" (15).

name: Adventures of Pipi 2: Save Hype
description: You play for Pipi, and you need to destroy enemy aliens and collect bitcoins with spinners.

name: HorseHotel
description: Take care of different horses and be the manager of the horse hotel!

name: Dreamer
description: HELP THE DREAMER NAVIGATE THROUGH NIGHTMARES

name: US Police limousine Car Quad Bike Transporter Game
description: Enjoy Transporting US Police limousine cars in transporter truck and aeroplane !

name: Zeus Quests Remastered Anagenissis of Gaia
description: A silly point and click adventure game with light-hearted humour.

name: Shanghai Rummy
description: Play Shanghai Rummy a fun and challenging variation of contract rummy now!

name: Be Zero
description: new original number puzzle with sci-fi style.Make every number to be zero!

name: Labyrinths of the World: Stonehenge Legend
Fear for Sale: The House on Black River
Famous Beaches VR (Lopes Mendes Beach Brazil)
Ouroboros Project
description: Let the historical legends follow your lead!

name: ColorPixel: Color by Number, Pixel Art
Splashy Tiles: Bouncing to the Beat
description: Swipe your fingers to control the ballHow far can you bounce to the beat

name: Football Star - Super Striker
description: Kick the football with vim and vigor!

name: Keep it up!
description: Stay alive! And keep it up! Keep the frog baby alive!

name: Isle of Tune Mobile
description:
Create your own unique musical journeys from street layouts. Roadside elements are your instruments and cars are the players.
Can you construct a tune that will get to the top of the island charts? Share your islands for others to view and earn ratings!

name: Redemption Cemetery: The Island of the Lost
WGT Baseball MLB
description: An official Major League Baseball licensed game with Hall of Fame MLB players and all your favorite MLB teams in turbo time! This is not a hardcore simulation game, just simple, clean, fast baseball fun, combining interactive batting action and strategic management. Collect Hall of Fame MLB players, hit homeruns and dominate your League Division. Featuring all 30 MLB teams including: Cardinals, Cubs, Dodgers, Giants, Mets, Orioles, Phillies, Rangers, Red Sox, Royals, Tigers, Yankees and more...

name: Videogame Guardians
description:
Guardians keep on going through the stages of the game, even when you're not playing!
An auto-combat game with cute dot graphics and retro game nostalgia!
Never die, Endless Rebirth IDLE Guardians!

name: Knife Dash: Hit to Crush Pizza
description: Tap the screen to launch a flying knife, dash, hit, crush the pizza and enjoy the fun of launching a flying knife and a pizza explosion. This is a game that perfectly relieves stress

name: Bullet Chess
description: A new twist on an age-old game, Bullet Chess is a top-down roguelike shooter where all of the enemies move and attack like chess pieces. Your weapons are also inspired by chess pieces, so everything is intuitive and easy to pick up. Beware though, it gets very hectic very quickly!

name: Toad Mountain
description: A Jumping Game that Uses Clicking Instead of The Keyboard to Jump.

name: Tiny Defense - Mini Robot Wars
description: Defend the world of tiny robots from the army of ruthless machines.

name: Eqqo
description: Eqqo is a heartening tale of a mother, a blind child and an Egg - voiced and captioned in many languages. A multi-layered story full of symbols and metaphors about hope, love, nature and everything that connects us. It has four to five hours of exploration and puzzle solving in sacred lands and monumental temple rooms, as well as 25 hidden parchment scrolls to find and reveal new parts of the legend.

name: WonderBlocks
description: The general public is woven in the world after the full-scale RPGBy the general public, a puzzle game for the general public

name: Awesome Space Delivery Company
description: You are a space delivery boy, flying your spaceship and making deliveries. You control your ship by tapping on the two sides of your screen. Flying around the levels making deliveries earns you money and you can use that money to upgrade your ship and unlock new planets to visit.

name: The Quest - Celtic Queen
description: The Quest - Celtic Queen is an expansion to The Quest.

name: Three Goblets
description:
In battle, click to select the monster you wish to attack. Your hero automatically attacks monsters and collects their loot.
When you fall in battle, you'll return to town. Equip the best items to make yourself more powerful. Hold the SHIFT button and click to dismantle items that you don't want. When you dismantle enough items, you can craft new rewards from the forge.
Lastly, specialize your character with stats and custom talents that will change the way you play. Which ones are the best? There are multiple ways to build your character, so try a few different options and see what works best.
Good luck!

name: Toodee and Topdee
description: A cosmic turbulence caused the 2D Platformer and the Top-Down Puzzler dimensions to merge! Switch between Toodee and Topdee and their unique perspectives to overcome hard-as-nails challenges, solve mind-melting puzzles and defeat huge bosses. Oh, and there's a co-op mode!

name: Mini Healer
description: Mini Healer is an MMO inspired RPG where you play as the healer in a party and challenge various bosses in the dungeon. Added with ARPG inspired loot system and deep character customization.

name: Medieval Cop: Wolf's Bane
description:
Wolf's Bane is a special episode focused around Ada Graceheart.

It's a spin-off of the serie Medieval Cop.

name: Kitty Catsanova
description: Kitty Catsanova is the premier Idle Cat Dating Sim! Collect adorable kitties and win their hearts by taking them out on lavish dates, crafting exquisite gifts, and buying them wondrous presents. Manage your time carefully, since you don't want any kitties to get lonely!

name: Religious Idle
description:
Religious Idle is the tycoon style game in which you will create a new religion using technology. It is the 21'st century after all so how better to find followers then to create an online religion? You will start your religion from scratch with the freedom to define names and attributes of your newly created faith.
As your following grows and more and more people turn to your religion, generous followers will start to donate money to you. You can use this money to invest in sacred relics and holy buildings that will attract more followers and even more donations. Create a religion to be remembered through the ages! Have fun!

name: Krystine and the children in chains
description: Help Krystine to rescue her little brother kept prisonner into the castle of nightmare

name: Puzlogic
description: Number-placement puzzle game based on rules of Sudoku and Kakuro.

name: Yorg.io
description: Yorg.io is a game about supply chains and zombies. Your goal is to build a base which survives the night, when zombies attack. Build defensive towers to protect your base. Towers need resources, so you have to build a supply chain using mines and processors. Try to survive as long as possible - can you beat your friends?

name: Star Quest: TCG
description: A fun and cunning campaign that brings you into the universe of Star Quest: TCG. Your spaceship has crashed in a mysterious planet during a space battle, and you have to start over. Defeat your opponents, recruit units, build a fleet and prepare yourself for the ultimate space card battle.

name: World's End Chapter 3
description:
The darkly comedic strategy RPG continues. Will Tevoran and Company find fortune as they plunge deeper into foreign political strife? 
 
Features 
Avoid plague spreading corpses, endure poison gas and repel invading zealots 
New terrain interactions including conveyor belts, hidden switches and more strangeness 
Flying & mounted enemies, remotely detonatable bombs and more new tactical elements 
21 new battles and an original soundtrack 
Option to continue from Chapter 2 saves

name: Pixoji
description: A hidden-picture puzzle game incorporating elements of nonograms, minesweeper, and other logic puzzles.

name: Cubito Mayhem
description: Cubito is a twin-stick arena shooter focused on bullet blocking mechanics. Face all those geometric figures that have been revealed from the vapornet and proclaim yourself the polygon master!

name: Song for a Bird
description: Today exactly 10 years ago I started this bontegames blog and here's my brand new free browser game to celebrate these 10 years of puzzle game blogging. I hope you enjoy Song for a bird!
1066 is a historical strategy game in which you are set in the middle of war, and you have to lead your people towards victory by defeating the enemy's army.

name: Dark Cut 3
description: Sedate, operate, survive! Face the challenge of reviving your family tree by operating on family members from the past. Test your knife on delicate procedures and tasks.

name: The Company of Myself
description: The Company of Myself is a story about a hermit.

name: Warlords: Heroes
description: Fight your way through 4 episodes of fantasy battle. Buying fighting moves, amour and hiring henchman to assist you on your journey.

name: MAD: Mutually Assured Destruction
description: Enemy missiles are attacking your base! Shoot them down and see how long you can last against the onslaught.

name: Beam Ball
description: Deflect an onslaught of laser beams and advance through 40 increasingly challenging levels in this fast-paced action game.

name: Exit/Corners
description: Exit/Corners is an episodic adventure featuring visual novel story segments and riddle-based puzzles. Five strangers find themselves trapped in an abandoned hotel that’s set to collapse in 24 hours. To escape alive, they'll have to solve their captor’s riddles and unravel the mystery behind their abduction.

name: Oiligarchy
description: Now you can be the protagonist of the petroleum era: explore and drill around the world, corrupt politicians, stop alternative energies and increase the oil addiction. Be sure to have fun before the resources begin to deplete.

name: Tower Keepers
description: Heroic strategy RPG with deep solo campaign and real-time head to head battles!

name: Faraway: Puzzle Escape
description: Faraway: Puzzle Escape is an adventure game, a modern tribute to Myst designed for phones and tablets. In Faraway you're an adventurer exploring ruins of ancient temples full of challenges and mysterious riddles.

name: The Final Earth
description:
The Final Earth is a mini city builder/simulation on a small planet.

It's 2100 and Earth has been made uninhabitable by devastating climate change. As a great scientist, you have prepared, of course. Over the last fifty years, you built a teleporter and transported yourself and some materials across the galaxy to the only habitable planet you could find. Unfortunately, it's pretty small. Can you build a new society on this planet?

name: God Awefull Clicker
description: God Awe-Full Clicker is an Endless Dungeon Clicker/Idle game full of Greek Mythology and Epic Battles with RPG style aspects.

name: Code Red
description: Find the room. Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 37

name: Crazy Christmas
description: You are Ethan! a former felony convicted who needs to deliver the cargo in time for christmas eve. Drive through the city with no morale but beware, The cops are hunting you! Good Luck!

name: Apple Worm
description: Apple Worm is a tricky puzzle game with a Snake-like mechanism. Eat the apples properly to longer your body and reach the exit portal.

name: G-Switch 3
description: Run and flip gravity at lightning-speed through twisted levels that will challenge your timing and reflexes.

name: Idle Wizard
description: RPG/Idle hybrid about becoming the most powerful wizard there is. Pick a class, get a pet, configure and improve your character in a miriad ways!

name: The Splitting: Chapter 2
description:
The Splitting is an episodic mystery adventure game.

In the 2nd chapter, Daniel arrives at an asylum, where he meets a group of people who lost their reflections. There he dives deeper into this world, and learns more details about the people he travels with.

name: Madalin Stunt Cars 2
description: Madalin Stunt Cars 2 is a driving game where you can complete crazy stunts in speedy supercars. Choose from 34 vehicles, including Pagani, Huracan, Ferrari, and more.

name: Turbo Town
description:
Did you miss him? Yeah, don't answer that...
Join Mr. Business on his quest to overcome his daddy issues by overcompensating for absolutely everything! Build the biggest town with the longest towers and most materialistic materials! Watch each building automatically consume and produce a variety of resources! The only finger you'll ever have to raise is your index finger, because exercise is a waste of time meant for the unwashed masses! Wallow in narcissism and shower yourself with boosts that come from the most golden of chests, then fill the hole in your heart by equipping them to buildings! Feel the joy of being Mr. Business' totally not imaginary subordinate, because you're the only thing keeping him from realizing he's another piece of detritus slowly spiraling around the toilet bowl of life!

name: Crafting Idle Clicker
description: Craft a complex production line, earn idle cash and become an industrial tycoon!

name: Solarmax 2
description:
The battle for Earth is over. Now, the war for the galaxy has begun. You must win every battle swiftly, decisively, and permanently.

Solarmax is a streamlined strategy game of interplanetary war. Colonize planets, build hundreds of starships, and use superior tactics to overwhelm your opponents. Command our entire fleet and lead us to victory.

name: Building Rush 2
description:
You are the boss! Manage the manufacturing and delivery of building materials to construction sites in multiple cities.

Build and upgrade your plants and construction fleets to produce, ship and sell the building materials that your plants generate. Deliver the goods as quickly and efficiently as possible to keep your customers happy and earn bigger bonuses. Watch out as your competitors will also set up factories to try and steal your business!

Earning medals and achievements will award you with money that you can spend to upgrade your facilities and fleets.
The better your performance on a level, the more money you'll earn to spend on upgrades. Replay completed levels to improve your scores and earn more money for upgrades!

It's time to get to work!

name: Mr.Timan
description: Mr.Timan was made for the ID.net+Y8.com Game Contest of March 2016. In the game you play as Mr.Timan, a new employee of the Time Company. All you need to know is to press the red button, however this might not be a good idea.

name: What's Inside the Box?
description: A wooden box is filled with puzzles, 100 puzzles! Now can you solve them all and discover what's inside???

name: Deterministic Dungeon
description:
I'm fed up with coding!
This is me passing the baton to you to determine everything that would have been random about this dungeon crawling game!
You are the Random Number Generator!

name: Upgrade Complete 3mium
description:
An evil mega-corporation has taken over your game! They demand you "pay to win" and, until you do, you are forced to trudge your way through the "lite," free, ad-supported version until you complete all the upgrades and unlock the final boss.

Will you prove you are more than just a "whale" to be milked for all you're worth?

name: Iridescent
description: Use the spectrite stones and your trusty slingshot in your quest to find the cure.

name: Easy Joe 4
description: Easy Joe goes on a wild adventure again. In Easy Joe 4 the bunny sees some trouble coming his way. You have to help him to solve riddles to complete each stage.

name: Strike Force Heroes 3
description: 60 missions, customizable weapons, and squads await in the massive Strike Force Heroes sequel you've been waiting for!

name: The Perfect Tower
description: Defend, upgrade, repeat! This idle strategy game combines a tower defense theme with incremental gameplay, resource management, and roguelike aspects. Fend off relentless waves, upgrade strategically, and experience the addictive thrill of ever-rising numbers.

name: Theropods
description: Face dinosaurs, solve puzzles and travel back to the time of ginormous lizards and pixelated adventure games.

name: The mother of the bird men
Quotidian
description:
Wake up in the morning. Drink a cup of coffee. Close the curtains and go to bed. The days change, but the ritual does not.

This is a short game, taking typically less than 10 minutes to complete. The days do not loop even though it appears so at first glance - each day is different and you'll miss out on some interesting scenes if you only play first day!

Quotidian was made for Global Game Jam 2016. The game was made entirely in 48 hours, with the theme of 'Ritual.'

name: Reach the core
description: In this free online digging game you play for a Commander of a spaceship stuck in the galaxy outskirts. Luckily, the screening of a nearby planet showed some plasma required for your next space jump. Control your miner with arrow keys of your finger as you play free online on your tablet or mobile phone. Collect resources and buy upgrades to enhance resistance and capacity of the miner battery before starting next day. Dig the ground in this free online arcade game for kids and make your way back home.

name: Christmas Cat
description: The Bonte cat jumps on top of the Christmas tree and sends the 20 red balls all around the house. Can you find all 20 balls by solving the puzzles?

name: Mobs, Inc.
description:
Mobs, Inc. is hiring new employees ! The dungeon the company has been taking care of, has become so attractive that too many adventurers are visiting it every day.

Become one these new employee hired to maintain a constant challenge for these adventurers. If you're doing your job quite well, the CEO might give you a promotion and enhance you with some new powerful skills.

name: Absorbed
description: It all started with one scientist experimenting in his lab. He called on you to try it. You absorbed some things and then suddenly an explosion occurred. A black whole appeared and brought you somewhere unknown. Continue in this manner and you might get back to where you came from. You just have to try it.

name: Wrassling
description: Wrassling is the national sport of Slamdovia, champion Wrasslers are regarded as the strongest athletes in the world.

name: Why Am I Dead: Rebirth
description: Why Am I Dead: Rebirth is an adventure game where you are trying to solve your own murder. As a ghost, you have the ability to control other people and use them to investigate your untimely demise.

name: RockerBox Tycoon
description: RockerBox Tycoon is an ore mining idle game on Flash.
